body.name: Skintimate PX-564 Signature Scents Moisturizing Shave Gel for Women, Raspberry Rain Scent with Vitamin E and Olive Butter - 7 Ounce , 2 Count (Pack of 1)
features: Foams into a rich creamy lather and allows the razor to glide easily over skin
Unbeatable razor protection for a close, comfortable shave and healthy feeling, smooth skin
body.description: Get ready for one berry smooth shave. Skintimate(r) raspberry rain(r) women's shave gel does more than just smell great - 6 moisturizers help replenish your skin's natural moisture and deliver unbeatable razor protection for a comfortable, more touchable shave.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Skintimate Raspberry Rain Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Coconut Delight Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Skin Therapy Dry Skin Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Vanilla Sugar Moisturizing Shave Gel Skintimate Skin Therapy Sensitive Skin Moisturizing Shave Gel Shave Gel Benefits Formulated with six moisturizers, Vitamin E and olive butter, this foaming shave gel with a luscious scent creates a rich, luxurious lather that aids razor glide for a close, comfortable shave and smooth, show-stopping legs. A hydrating formula with coconut water + six moisturizers, including Vitamin E and olive butter to help replenish and protect the skin with a coconut and exotic plumeria petal fragrance with rich moisturizers for smooth, irresistibly touchable skin Replenish your skin's natural moisture with Skintimate Dry Skin Shave Gel and stop dreading the shave. The lotion-like gel foams into a rich protective lather for a close, comfortable shave and smooth, healthy-looking skin Formulated with six hydrating moisturizers, including shea butter and Vitamin E, with the rich, sweet scent of Vanilla and Sugar Skintimate Sensitive Skin Shave Gel is formulated with extra conditioners and lubricants like aloe and Vitamin E to moisturize and soften skin, and protect against painful nicks and irritation. It even helps replenish your skin’s natural moisture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great even for MEN
reviews.reviewText: First off, I am a MAN and I have been using this product for years. This truly protects my skin better and makes the task of shaving easier than any of the other 'Men's Shaving Gels/Creams' I've tried over the years. I personally only shave my face/neck and intimate area, and this product does a fantastic job. I think the aroma is light and pleasant, but really only notice the aroma while shaving. Perhaps if I shaved more surface area regularly (legs and chest as well) then maybe the aroma would be noticeable afterwards and linger. The only scents I notice throughout the day come from my normal soap/body-wash and shampoo, whereas the shaving gel isn't even noticeable. There are a lot of user comments on both ends of the spectrum when it comes to scent. There is an ENORMOUS difference between something smelling awful, smelling awful on you, and/or being a scent that smells fine but you don't want to smell like it all day. I shave in the shower, and always rinse my face after shaving. I have never noticed a lingering scent, or residue on the skin left from shaving with this product. Most of the time there should be no noticeable difference having bought this in a store vs online. However, online orders tend to sit out on your deck for hours before being brought inside. If this was a t-shirt or the weather was always pleasant between 40-80F then it wouldn't matter. However, people leave this out for hours both during freezing cold temperatures and in scorching direct sunlight. Too long in the cold and you'll notice it's harder to get all the product out (even waiting plenty of time for it to acclimate before use). This contains a lot of different oils (sunflower seed oil glyceride, hydrogenated vegetable oil, fruit oil, and olive oil). When left in direct sunlight on a hot day, the ingredients can start separating and breaking down. This in turn can attribute to many of the comments about it coming out discolored, runny, altered fragrance, etc. Bottom line this is a real good product, just don't leave it outside too long during either extreme of the temperature spectrum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Shaving Gel!
reviews.reviewText: My favorite shaving gel by Skintimate. Excellent line of products. It moisturizes & hydrates my skin. My legs feel soft & refreshed after shaving. A little bit of gel spreads a long way. The scent Raspberry Rain is so nice & soothing. This makes the chore of shaving sometimes less painful :) I take advantage of amazon subscribe & save which allows me to conveniently order any month I need it & saves me money as well. Definitely recommend this shaving gel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using since forever
reviews.reviewText: My legs always feel smoother when I feel shaving cream. When I run out, I usually wait a while to buy some more, thinking it's unnecessary. I'm always surprised when I splurge on some more and see what a difference it makes. Skintimate is what I've been using since I started shaving and it makes me feel very girly when I do. Smells good but not too strong. Lathers up very nice. The only thing I don't like is that it's hard to keep the nozzle clean. And if you leave the jar in the shower for too long it starts to get rusty. But other than that, it's wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Shaving Cream
reviews.reviewText: This has been my go-to shaving cream for years. I like it because of the smooth shave it gives me and the moisturizing quality of the gel. It's good value for money and I would never think to buy any shaving cream that is more expensive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but Reduces Nicks and Cuts
reviews.reviewText: Although it is geared for men, I use the Gillette Fusion ProShield Chill Men's Razorblades on my legs and underarms with a Skiintimate Signature Scents shaving gel, as well. The shave gel builds up a really thick lather quickly and provides a nice raspberry scent. I don't cut my self shaving frequently at all. My only gripe is that these bottles doin't last me very long. I use one bottle ever 2 weeks with daily use, which adds up money wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Skintimate is the only shaving cream that’s moisturizing and works for me. Glad to be able to buy it in a twin pack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I'm absolutely in love with this shaving gel. It comes out as a pink gel and foams up when you spread it around. A little goes a long way. It's so moisturizing and it smells very good. This is definitely my favorite shaving gel from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skintimate shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: By far, always the best shaving cream! I think if men knew about it they’d use it! My son had to borrow mine once when visiting, and loved it as it never knocked him and made his face soft! I’ve used this brand for 25-30 yrs and every time I e tried another brand, I regret it! I hate that the price has tripled in past 5 yrs, so I’m always looking for sales and then stocking up! This shaving cream balloons up in your palm, so you only need a little for an entire leg! I haven’t knicked anywhere in over a decade!!
